name: joker-eso
description: Best enjoyed with Skooma, Joker offers a collection of various jokes, riddles, fun utilities & other amusing pop-culture references - all readily available ingame for your leisurely chatting pleasure!

scripts.build: if not exist dist\%npm_package_version% mkdir dist\%npm_package_version% && tar -a -c -f dist\%npm_package_version%\Joker-%npm_package_version%.zip --exclude=node_modules --exclude=dist --exclude=.git --exclude=images --exclude=.vscode --exclude=deploy/credentials.js --exclude=.deploy-exclude * .*
scripts.dev-copy: xcopy "." "%USERPROFILE%\OneDrive\Documents\Elder Scrolls Online\live\Addons\Joker" /s /i /y /exclude:.deploy-exclude && echo Copied to live Addons folder.
